title: looking for gold + flex / solo duo ranked players
body: need good decent people that can hold there own no feeders or trolls gold + must have discord

replies.body: you acting like that is exactly my point, you sound like a child who is a toxic feeder that also trolls and needs to be carried to gain elo.  "few bad games" you lose more than you win and most of your games have 8+ deaths, so unless you have any facts to state i suggest you keep that dirty mouth of yours shut kid.
feeders? looking at your match history you die a lot buddy ;)
buddy? u seem cheeky had a few bad games yesterday and im a support player ?? you saying that shows your a retard dont come on here and wind people up "buddy"
